amendment.description: An amendment numbered 79 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to require the Under Secretary of Defense for Acquisition and Sust ainment to submit a report to Congress on the progress of the Department's implementation of on-site PFAS destruction technologies not requiring incineration and extends the moratorium on PFAS incineration enacted in the FY22 NDAA.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires the Under Secretary of Defense for Acquisition and Sust ainment to submit a report to Congress on the progress of the Department's implementation of on-site PFAS destruction technologies not requiring incineration and extends the moratorium on PFAS incineration enacted in the FY22 NDAA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Levin (MI) amendment (A023) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 233 - 196 (Roll no. 330).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A023) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Levin (MI).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Levin (MI) amendment (A023) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 233 - 196 (Roll no. 330).
